inn1.comm: starts off with a good length ball accompanied by some away movement, poked out towards point off an outside edge
Finn drags his length back, shortish, top-of-off line. Guptill leaps off his feet, drops it in front of the covers and gets off the mark
banged in short and rises outside off, Baz hops up and rides it towards point. Good bounce for Finn, already
greater bounce.. Finn tests Baz with a bumper. He gets out of the way. One for the over
Baz gets into a shot-making stride. Shortish, Baz runs down the track, takes it on, launching it over midwicket for a six. It looked like a slower one and Baz spotted it

Finn responds and how.. He exults.. Fractionally short and nips back in, Baz is crease-bound as he aims to push it or rather force it through the off side. He can only drag it back onto the stumps via an inside edge. The bails get tipped off. Six and out!
back of a length and on middle, he hangs back and works it to short midwicket
clipped away off the hips behind square on the leg side. Hales dives across by the boundary and hauls the ball in, keeping it to three
pitched up and on off and swinging away around off, Williamson squirts it to third man through an outside edge
fuller and just a shade outside off, Guptill strides forward and pushes it to the left of the covers
veering onto the pads, he aims to flick and manages an inside edge onto the pads. It dribbles to leg
too full and straight, flicked past midwicket
back of a length and zips through on off, Williamson drops it behind the wicket, in front of Bairstow
shortish and too straight, picked away backward of square leg. They hustle across for two, beating the throw quite comfortably
on a length and outside off, Williamson camps back and guides it towards point
back of a length and outside off with extra lift, Williamson watches it through to Bairstow
dug in shortish and outside off, Williamson controls a pull over midwicket. They run three, the outfield has perhaps slowed down after the drizzle
incoming ball on off, Guptill hangs back and defends it back to the bowler
full and slanted across off with the angle, left alone
pitched up and swinging away ever so slightly, beats the outside edge. Soundly beaten
swinging in on the pads, Williamson does not connect with the glance and wears it on the pad. But this was snaking down leg
Williamson stays back and guides this back-of-a-length ball outside off to point
back of a length and attacking off again, he drops it behind the wicket by employing soft hands
Willey errs too full and straight, neatly flicked to the right of short midwicket
shortish and sort of skids on off, Guptill sits back, looks for a forcing stroke through the off side, a la Baz. He gets an inner edge, which trickles back to the bowler
pitched up and outside off, Guptill does not want any of it
good length on off, bunted in front of the covers for a well-judged single
good length and tails in on off, worked to the leg side off an inside edge
back of a length and outside off, jabbing punch from Guptill, but he can't beat the tight off-side ring
Finn goes up for an lbw appeal, umpire Oxenford shakes his head. Back of a length, takes the flap of the thigh pad en route to Bairstow as he does not connect with the pull
back of a length and hurries outside off, Williamson hangs his bat out and gets beaten
dug in shortish and on off, blocked to short cover
fuller and jags away off the seam, he pokes it down to third man off an outside edge. Williamson aimed a leg-side shot but did not get hold of it
extra pace.. Short and hurries onto Guptill, who takes his eyes off the hook, loses his balance and mis-controls a pull over backward square leg. Top-edged it..
shortish and curls in, punchily defended to mid-off off the back foot
a bit too full on the stumps, Guptill drives past Williamson and beats mid-on to his left, although he did not time it well. Guptill examines the toe end of his bat
good length and teasing Williamson outside off. He wafts loosely and misses
fullish and holds its line outside off, Williamson tightens up his technique and lets it pass
much wider outside off, some away movement as well. Ignored

banged in shortish and outside off, Williamson is up on his tippy-toes as he gets on top of the bounce and punches it crisply past the covers. Nice, high elbow and he becomes the first player to tally 1000 ODI runs this calendar year
on a length and around off, blocked from the crease
Guptill walks across off a touch, Finn is put off as he drags it down leg. Guptill can't connect with a pull. Wide called
on a length and on off, he comes forward and blocks it to mid-off
fullish and outside off, Williamson is happy to shoulder arms
full and outside off, Williamson hunts for a cover-drive but drags it towards mid-on off an inside edge
even full and swerves in a touch on off, pushed straight to mid-on
very full and outside off again, drive-able length. Takes the inside edge and wanders away towards mid-on, again
full and outside off again, Williamson is lured into another drive. The bat twists in his hand and he manages to scoop it in the gap between the two cover fielders
Williamson nails the drive. Overpitched and around off, he flows forward and drives it through mid-off. Crunched
tests Guptill with a bumpy short ball outside off, Guptill pulls it up and over midwicket, one-bounce four. Impressive timing after top edging one earlier
back of a length and swerves in off the seam, inside-edges it to the left of the keeper for one
back of a length and on middle, Williamson gets right behind the line to block it solidly
b-e-a-u-t-i-f-u-l. Back of a length and outside off, Williamson is up on his tippy-toes again, punching it in the gap at the covers, outruns a chasing Morgan
back of a length and wide outside off, Williamson has a crack at it and edges it thickly, it flies to the right of first slip. Finn has his hands on his head.
fullish and outside off, he pokes and gets beaten. No feet movement
back of a length and hurries outside off, mis-times a cut to point. Guptill has a look at the toe end of the bat
fractionally short and outside off, semi-flicked and semi-pulled backward of square on the leg side
a tad overpitched and outside off, Williamson lays into a drive and finds mid-off
on a length and outside off, Williamson chases it, opens his face late and ensures that it does not carry to first slip
shortish and outside off, dabbed to gully this time after one bouncer

nearly dragged on. Wood ventures wide of the crease and hurls a short one outside off, Williamson wants to force it through the off side and gets an inside edge that evades the stumps. Bairstow moves to his left and makes a half-save
pitched up and outside off, forward and driven straight to mid-off
shortish and on off, Guptill stands tall and punches it to the man at cover
Willey attacks the stumps, blocked
overpitched and width on offer as well. Guptill throws his hands at it as he launches it deliberately over the covers
back of a length, Guptill stands tall and punches it to short cover
on a length and outside off, flashed behind point. The fielder in the deep dives, keeping it to a couple
pitched up and in the corridor, Williamson pushes and watches the ball skim past the outside edge
back of a length and outside off, chopped into the ground. It loops over a leaping gully
shortish and hurries on middle, Guptill is cramped for room. He drops it to the leg side, in front of midwicket. They sneak a single by the time Wood gets to the ball
full and outside off, mis-hits a drive to mid-off
back of a length and outside off, dabbed towards gully, the fielder dives to his left and makes a smart stop
back of a length and on off, Guptill is cramped for room again. He attempts a forcing stroke though the off side. Gets an inside edge/ toe end, behind the stumps
back of a length and angling away outside off, left alone
good length and outside off, Williamson shuffles across off and glides it to point off the face of the bat
back of a length, Williamson seeks to flick and gets an inside edge onto the pad
back of a length and outside off, chopped through vacant gully to third man
straighter in line, eased down the ground to long-on for one
incoming ball, worked to short midwicket
on a back of a length and outside off, mis-hits the punch to point. Another one skewed off the toe end
veering onto the pads, he picks it from there and nonchalantly flicks it over midwicket. Billings runs to his left and dives, but can't prevent the ball from reaching the boundary. He palmed it away
on a length and on middle, blocked
back of a length and punched to short cover
very full and on off, toe-ends a drive to short cover and inspects his bat again
Guptill secures a single down to third man after beating Roy to his left at gully
on a length and straight in line, blocked
back of a length and on off, Guptill seeks to punch through the off side and gets an inside edge to the right of a diving Willey
on a length and angled away outside off, stays low and beats Williamson, who was seeking to dab it behind square on the off side
good length, tight line on off. Williamson hangs back as he blocks it to point
pitched up and outside off, driven smoothly through vacant mid-off, but there is protection in the deep
shortish, top-of-off line, punched to the off side
full and wide outside off, Williamson bends his knee and drives it over the covers
cuts back in on off, Guptill aims a forcing stroke through the off side and ends up getting an inside edge that wanders away towards fine leg
back of a length and swerves back in to rap Williamson on his front pad. This was sliding down leg though. Williamson weathers the lbw appeal. Height was an issue as well
back of a length, punched to short cover
on a length and outside off, dabbed past gully to third man
fuller and on off, he throws his bat at a drive and mis-times it to mid-off
Williamson takes a step forward and shuffles across, Willey bowls it short, dropped safely to the off side
deliberately dabbed to the left of gully as this was a back-of-a-length ball outside off
back of a length and on middle, Guptill glides it to deep third man
fuller and on off, down the track and clipped to mid-on
shortish and outside off, flat-batted to mid-off for a tight single. Root gets to the ball quickly but can't effect a direct hit
on a length and outside off, driven down to long-off
full and fired on off, Guptill mis-hits a drive to mid-on
shortish and jags back in, Williamson hops up, seeks to punch and manages an inside edge onto the pad
dragged short and down leg, Williamson swivels and helps it fine to the left of Bairstow
back of a length and outside off, punched to backward point with an open face
shortish and cuts back in, jabbing punch to the right of mid-on
pitched up and angled in on off, defensively pushed back to Stokes
legbreak outside off, he hangs back and punches it down to long-on off the back foot
overpitched and outside off, Guptill drills it to the covers
loopier on middle, squeezed down to long-on
half-tracker on off, Williamson waits on it before pulling it to deep midwicket
tossed up, down the track and pushed down to long-on. Williamson raises another fifty, his fourth fifty-plus score in a row
punched down to long-on
overpitched and outside off, Guptill lashes it past the covers, beats mid-off as well. Top strike..
back of a length and outside off, beaten by extra bounce. Guptill plays a loose cut and does not connect as the ball bounces over the bat
strays onto the pads, picked away to long leg
fullish and outside off, forward and driven to short cover

Williamson throws his head back. Stokes breaks the partnership. Another batsman plays on. Shortish and jags in at 140.1ks, Williamson aims for a jabbing pull over the leg side and ends up dragging it back onto the stumps. The middle stump is splintered into half..
greets Taylor with a rising short ball, which is fended to the leg side
looped up outside off, driven down to long-off
low full toss on middle, bunted to long-on
Rashid held this one back on off, Taylor scoops it in front of short cover
fuller and on off, driven to long-off
straight roller on middle, driven to long-off
Rashid drags his length back, nudged behind the square leg umpire
fullish and tails in, clipped through backward square leg for a couple
back of a length and on middle, Taylor goes forward and across as he blocks it back to the bowler
veering down leg, helped to long leg
shortish and on middle, Guptill leaps off his feet and glances it to long leg
on a good length and outside off, forward and pushed to short cover
slippery short ball on middle, might have been a slower one. Taylor waits and pulls to deep midwicket
blocked to short cover off the back foot
picked away off the pads through midwicket for one
flighted generously on middle, tapped to point
fullish and on middle, drags a slog-sweep in front of long-on, possibly off the toe end
pitched up and on middle, pushed back to Rashid
end of a tight over. He aims for a leg-side shot, gets a leading edge in front of short cover
on a length and outside off, pushed to short cover
back of a length and punched to point off the back foot
on a back of a length and on off, pushed to short cover
short and outside off, punched out to deep cover
fullish and on off, Taylor gets forward and taps it to mid-on
shortish and outside off, forced to the left of short cover. The press on for the third
shortish legbreak outside off, slapped to sweeper cover
flighted and on middle and leg, defended to short midwicket
slid through on off, Guptill goes on the back foot and mis-hits a cut. Chopped to the covers
quicker on off, patted wide of point and Guptill brings up a fifty of his own
tossed up on middle and turns away. This dips in late and is poked to the off side off an outer edge
flatter and on off, punched off the back foot to deep midwicket
short inducker, he hops up and manages an inside edge that bounces over the stumps and dribbles behind the wicket
short again, outside off. Guided to deep third man
on a length and outside off, not a cuttable length, chopped to point
back of a length and climbs on off, punched in front of square on the off side
fullish and comes in on off, Taylor comes forward and pats it to mid-on
short and just a shade outside off, chopped to the right of deep third man
floated up and turning away, pushed wide of point for one
flatter legbreak outside off, cut away to sweeper cover
slid through outside off, chopped straight to point
looped up on middle, defended back to the bowler
full and wide outside off, he throws his bat at a drive and hits in the air. Root dives to his right at short cover and  the ball bursts out. Dropped
fired on middle, risky to cut. He still goes through with the shot and chops it towards point
back of a length and outside off, chopped to Roy at backward point
full and outside off, thrashed to deep cover
Guptill opens the face of his bat on impact with this back-of-a-length ball outside off and glides it to third man
short on middle, he hops up and works it through backward square leg
nifty ramp. Shortish and outside off, Guptill arches back and lifts it over the keeper's head. Away she goes for a six
on a good length and curves in, skirts past the outside edge of the groping bat
Rippah. Pitched on middle and spins sharply past the outside edge. Taylor is beaten and so is Bairstow
fuller and outside off, laced to deep cover
full and wide outside off, he bends his knee and marmalises it past the covers. Terrific timing
pushed through, defended
low full toss on middle, paddled through backward square leg for three
Taylor secures a single to sweeper cover
short and wide outside off, he fetches it from there and pulls it to deep midwicket. Slower ball at 105ks, Taylor did well to delay his shot
too straight and it's tucked to the right of short midwicket
fullish and outside off, Taylor eases forward and caresses it to mid-off
back of a length, turned to short midwicket
full and on middle, Taylor shuffles across and clips a single through backward square leg
Stokes strikes again. Guptill undone by extra lift. Back of a length and zipping through, Guptill is caught napping in the corridor. He pushes and nicks off. Bairstow moves to his right to snaffle it
looped up on a fourth-stump line, driven to short cover
flighted and on middle, pushed down to long-on
full and outside off, slapped to the right of mid-off, diving save
flatter and quicker, Santner hangs back and punches it to mid-off
leg-stumpish ball, tucked out to midwicket
pushes this googly outside off, Santer has a crack at it and does not connect
back of a length and angled in, tapped to short cover
pitched up and on a fourth-stump line, Taylor strides forward and drives it to mid-off
angled in on a length and on off, pushed to mid-on
a tad overpitched and outside off, eased to sweeper cover
back of a length and on middle, blocked to mid-off
back of a length again, angled away. Steered down to third man

The Santner experiment fails. Rashid gives this legbreak ample air. Santer steps out and misses the attempted strike over the leg side. The ball rips through the bat-pad gap and hits the leg stump. It pitched on a fourth-stump line and rattled the top of leg. Top ball from Rashid and New Zealand have been pegged back after the Guptill-Williamson stand
fuller and on middle and leg, he sinks to one knee and sweeps it behind square on the leg side
looped up and outside off, chipped to the left of a diving bowler. It was the googly and replays show that Rashid finger-tipped it away
tossed up, poked to point off an outside edge
Rashid drags his length back, punched to deep backward point
slower through the air, tapped to the covers
good length on off, dropped in front of short cover for a speedy one. Stokes picks up the ball, turns around but misses a direct hit at the bowlers'. Taylor calls for the single and gets it
short and outside off, beaten on the cut
good length and curls in a touch on off, Elliott shuffles across and looks to work it over the leg side. Pops off the pad and dies in front of an on-rushing bowler
back of a length and comes in from outside off to smack him on the pad
Elliott shuffles across and misses the flick, Finn slides it down leg. Wide called
back of a length and on off, he aims to turn it to leg but ends up defending it in front of mid-off
on a length and outside off, driven to short cover
tossed up on the leg stump, lovely dip, off the pad and trickles to the left of Bairstow
straight roller on middle, paddled fine on the leg side. The man from slip, gives the chase and keeps it to two
flighted on middle, Elliott makes a trip down the track and drives it to long-off
looped up, googly, turns in, defended to silly mid-on
floated up, eased to sweeper cover
a big appeal for lbw, umpire Oxenford is not interested. Elliott prods forward and manages an inside edge onto the pad, weathering the lbw appeal
too full and straight, he twirls his wrists and flicks it to the right of short midwicket
on a length and outside off, helped to backward point with an open face
banged in short and outside off, pulled over cow corner
on a length and cuts back in, beats the inside edge and just about beats the off stump
Finn errs on the pads, sweetly-timed flick over midwicket
fullish and on off, Taylor gets forward and covers up his off stump in defence
shortish and outside off, guided to backward point off the face of the bat

on a length and outside off, driven impressively to the right of a diving short cover, beats mid-off to his left and skips away to the boundary. Gorgeous timing and equally good placement. He just caressed it
on a length and outside off, punchily driven to the right of the off-side sweeper
Elliott tips forward and drives this length ball to short cover
on a length and comes in, driven back to the bowler, who dives in his followthrough and stops the ball
good length on off, pushed down to mid-off for one
full and wide outside off, he goes for a loose away-from-the-body drive and is beaten
banged in short on a leg-stump line, he gets into a tangle. Hits the shoulder, then the back of the bat and dribbles away in front of the keeper
length ball, pushed to the off side
dug in short and wide outside off, cut away firmly, beats backward point's dive to his right and races away to the boundary
fullish and on off, pushed to mid-off for another of those quick singles
dropped short and outside off, Taylor controls a pull to deep midwicket

what a clanger. Stokes is late to bend down and lets it through his legs. Picked away off the pads through backward square leg. Stokes runs across and then makes a meal of it. First four for Taylor after 54 balls. Stokes, though, straightaway puts his hand up in apology
fortunate outside edge. Wood draws a false stroke, runs away through vacant first slip. Make that succesive fours
back of a length, pushed to mid-off
too full and straight, tucked to the leg side
shortish, knocked in front of square leg for one
short and directed at the body, pulled away behind square leg. There is protection in the deep, though
on a length and outside off, down the track and check-driven over vacant mid-off for four
back of a length and on middle, he nurdles a couple behind square leg. Alert running between the wickets
lifter outside off, Elliott drags his bat inside the line and lets it pass
veering down leg, deflected to long leg
shortish and on middle, he is a tad late on the pull. Hit on the body below the chest and runs away fine on the leg side
length ball, defended to mid-on
tossed up on middle, down the track, does not meet the pitch and pushes it back to the bowler
dropped and Morgan is the culprit. Elliott makes room and cuts it in the air. Morgan dives full-stretch to his left but ends up spilling it. Rashid could have had his second wicket
shortish and spinning away, cut to sweeper  cover
driven down to long-on
Rashid has his man now. Wrong'un outside off, Elliott, who did not read it, skipped down the track and missed it. Bairstow collects it and whips off the bails to end Elliott's sprightly knock
Rashid lets rip another googly, kept out
on a good length and on middle, driven to long-on off the inner part of the bat
tucked off the hips past midwicket
No fifty for Taylor. He edges it behind. Full and cuts away outside off, Taylor pushes with firm hands and feeds an outside edge. Bairstow dives across to his right and takes a smart catch
full and on middle and leg, he closes his bat face and plays it to the leg side
too straight again, clipped to deep midwicket
banged in short, not much sting on it. Pulled to deeo midwicket off the back foot
back of a length and on off, Wheeler camps back and dabs it in front of short cover
short and on middle, Wheeler sits back and diffuses it onto the pitch
fractionally short, dropped in front of point
shortish and outside off, he loads up for a cut and ends up bottom-edging it to Bairstow
full on off, pushed to mid-off
dug in on a shortish length and width on ofer as well, he nails a cut and sends it up over backward point
full and on off, blocked to short cover

soft, soft dismissal for Ronchi. On a good length and outside off, may have stopped on Ronchi. He looks to loft-drive it but chips it to mid-off, where Morgan pouches an overhead catch. Ronchi examines the toe end of the bat as he trudges back. NZ  have taken three wickets in four overs... David Willey's father - Peter - looks happy in the stands, wearing a smile
on a length and on middle, powerfully driven over the bowler's head
short and wide outside off, skewed in the air over mid-off. Morgan runs back but can't get there in time
back of a length and outside off, dabbed to point

TV umpire called in for a run-out chance. Tucked away behind square on the leg side. Southee calls for a couple, dives and makes his ground even as Bairstow took the bails off in a flash. A better throw from Sam Billings would have put Southee in trouble
back of a length and outside off, Wheeler steers it past slip to third man
wild swish and a miss to a length ball outside off
full and on off, driven to the left of mid-on for one
beaten soundly.. Back of a length and zipping away past the outside edge
dragged short and down leg, he misses the pull. Off the third and wanders away in front of fine leg. Bairstow has it covered
low full toss on off, mis-hits a drive and finds the man at cover
back of a length and angling away outside off, Wheeler rides it to deep third man
length and on middle, Southee swings it in the air. Stokes rushes forward from long-on but the ball lands just in front of him
banged in short, hurries onto Wheeler. Mis-hits a pull to mid-on
back of a length and outside off, beaten on the cut

shortish and outside off, change-up ball. Slower one, down the track and carved over backward point. Hales sprints in, the ball drops in front of him. He did well to get his body behind the ball, though
banged in short, tame pull to the right of midwicket
back of a length and rises on middle, slower ball. He waits on it before dabbing it towards gully
leg-stump ball, short and slower in pace. Southee rocks back and helps it fine of short fine leg. Put away with ease
low full toss on middle and leg, clipped away to cow corner. Deep midwicket runs across to his left and makes a diving save, flicking it back to a chasing mid-on
right in the blockhole on middle, jabbed in front of point
Stokes hunts for a yorker, serves up a full toss, which is whipped away to deep midwicket
The leg stump is tilted back. Back of a length, Southee goes for a big whoosh, perhaps down the ground. He does not connect, Stokes nails the leg stump
short and wide outside off, cut straight to backward point
slower cutter, dabbed down to third man
another slower one on middle, Henry waits on it and bunts it to mid-on
very full and on middle, half-volley, Henry sits back and pushes it down the ground, to the long-off boundary
back of a length, swung away. Rashid dives to his right at short midwicket and makes a smart stop. 250 up for NZ
back of a length and outside off, slapped away to sweeper cover
back of length and on middle, he winds up and whacks it away over long-on. Good ol' thump
tucked away to the leg side for two
Wheeler nips down the track, the bowler drags his length back. Wheeler swings and misses
Wheeler makes room outside leg, Stokes slips in a slower ball. Wheeler is early into the sliced hit as the ball loops over the stumps
near yorker, dug out. Evades the leg stump and trickles to the left of Bairstow
Henry steps away outside leg and slogs this length ball to deep midwicket
fractionally short and outside off, Henry clears his front leg, winds up and pummels it over Billings at deep midwicket
even shorter and outside off. Henry hunts for an encore but misses. Din't connect with the attempted slog over cow corner
Henry holes out to Stokes. Back of a length outside off, slowy ball at 114.2ks. Henry is early into the slog and skews it to long-on for a simple catch. The change of pace hoodwinked Henry..
Wheeler steps away outside leg, Finn chases and slips in a slowy bumpy short ball. Wheeler waits on it before ramping it over Bairstow with a healthy helping of cheek
and another. He backs away outside leg again, Finn follows him with a length ball at 141.1ks. Wheeler launches it over cow corner
Wheeler finishes the innings with a flourish. Finn dishes out a length ball outside leg. Wheeler had made room, clobbering it over long-on

inn2.comm: back of a length and swerving away outside off, Roy is squared up a bit as he squirts it to third man off an outer edge
back of a length again, swings away outside off. Hales is crease-bound as he wafts and misses
similar length and on middle and leg, worked to the right of mid-on for one
Southee ventures wide of the crease and sprays this down leg, deflected fine on the leg side off the thigh pad
back of a length and swings away again, dropped tentatively in front of the covers. Roy hunts for a quick single but is sent back
on a length and sustains the away movement outside off, Roy chases and outside-edges it to third man
Roy comes down the track, Santner smartly shortens his length, nudged wide of midwicket

Whoa!  Stunning, one-hander from Williamson. Santer drags it even shorter at 98.6ks, Hales skips back, pulls it in the air. Williamson at square leg, leaps and comes down with the ball in his left hand. Great start for New Zealand
near yorker, squeezed out
on a length with some spin, poked wide of the covers. There is some a communication breakdown but no harm done
pushed through, driven to mid-off
Root threads the gap now, gets off the mark with a four. Floated full and outside off, Root drives it to the left of the covers. Lovely timing
Roy races down the track, Southee bangs it short, dragged in front of mid-on
back of a length and swings in a bit, pushed down to mid-on
Southee tests Roy with a lifter, who does not get hold of the pull. Mis-hits it behind square leg, wide of short fine leg
short and wide outside off, Southee gets away with that. Flat-batted straight to short cover
Southee pushes it too full and down leg, wide called
Southee errs down leg again
fired full on off, inside-edged to mid-on as the bat twisted in Roy's hand
mighty full, tails in on a near-yorker length, he brings his bat down and clips it away behind square leg, beats the fielder's dive in the deep. Southee plays the penalty for overstepping

The third umpire called in for a stumping chace. Rochi fumbled on the first attempted but managed to take the bails off on the second. Santner's footing is fine. Santer gets turn outside off and lures Root out of the crease. He is beaten by spin, beaten in flight. The ball hit Ronchi just under the chin area, but he plucked it on the rebound off the chest to catch Root short. Santer strikes again!
and Morgan is gone for a golden duck. Pushed through on middle, Morgan loads up, slog-sweeps and holes out to deep midwicket. Perhaps, he intended to go squarer. England in tatters at 20 for 3
much slower through the air and spinning away, tapped to backward point
slid through, he sinks to one knee and misses the sweep, taking it on the front pad. Impact outside off
driven down to long-off
fired at 92.4ks, pushed to long-on
back of a length and on middle, Stokes seeks to turn to leg and gets a leading edge in front of the bowler
back of a length and seams away outside off, swish and a miss
back of a length and outside off, whipped to mid-off
Stokes skips away outside leg, he looks to drive this back-of-a-length ball and does not connect
similar length, the line is outside off, pushed to mid-off
shortish and outside off, flat-batted back to the bowler without much power. No timing either.
quicker through the air, Stokes goes for a slog-sweep and nails it in front of square. He placed it in between the two men in the deep
fired outside off, Stokes attempts another slog-sweep and is beaten. So is Ronchi
on a length and on middle, straight ball, chipped inside out over to long-off
picked away off the pads through midwicket, rare misfield from Baz as he gifts another run
flat and on middle and leg, slog-swept towards deep square leg
darted on middle, down the track. Roy wants to go over the leg side but only manages an inside edge onto the pad
dug in short and just outside off, Stokes rocks back and powers a pull over midwicket
Stokes dances down the track, the bowler bangs it short on a leg-stump line and cramps Stokes for room. Yet, he adjusts and pulls it fine on the leg side
Baz takes it and England are in trouble. On a length and on middle, he clears his front leg and aims to launch it over mid-off. He does not time it well, though. Baz leaps off his feet and pouches it
back of a length and outside off, Bairstow stands tall and punches it between the covers and mid-off
on a length and outside off, driven to mid-off
good length and outside off, forward and driven to the covers
Roy steps down the track, shortish and punched to mid-on
flighted and spinning away, chipped over the covers
looped up and outside off, driven past a diving short cover but long-off runs to his right and keeps it to two
darted on a short of a length, tucked up for room. Played to the off side
skiddy ball, hurries on, defended in front of the covers
flat on the leg stump, jabbed in front of square leg

And gets a wicket first ball on debut. Dug in short and swings away outside off, Roy was caught between carving it over backward point and perhaps leaving. He just hung it bat out, skewing it up in the air off the bottom half of the bat. Guptill runs back from backward point and takes it
shortish and outside off, he hops up and secures a single to third man
shortish and on off, diffused in front of the covers
back of a length and outside off, Billings rides it to point
similar length, dabbed in front of point
extra lift on this back of a length ball, nudged to the right of midwicket
tossed up, he comes down the track, seeks to work to leg and gets a leading edge to the left of a diving Santner. This ball did grip in the pitch
straighter on off, defended
low full toss outside off, drilled to long-off
flat and on middle, forward and pushed back to the bowler
down and track and pushed to mid-off. Quick single and Billings beats the throw from Baz
floated up on middle, laced to long-off
back of a length and zipping through outside off, Billings swings and misses
much fuller and Billings drives it in the air, to the right of the bowler and finds the long-on boundary. Punchily driven between Bairstow and the umpire
full and outside off, driven in the air but to the left of short cover
dragged short and down leg, helped on it away to the long leg boundary
short and just outside off, punched down to mid-off
fullish and on off, forward and pressed down the ground. Mid-off moves to his right and has it covered
darted flat, arm ball arrows in, punched towards the covers
straighter on middle and leg, pushed to mid-on
on a length and on middle and leg, Bairstow extends his arms and hoists it over mid-on
slid through on middle and leg, milked to deep midwicket
reverse-swept to backward point from a middle and off line
straight roller on middle, tucked through midwicket. Santer chases and keeps it to one
back of a length and outside off, punched to point
tucked off the pads through midwicket
short and rises outside off, messes with Billings' attempted pull. The ball goes only as far as short midwicket
back of a length and on middle, defended to mid-on
shortish and outside off, he steers it to the left of backward point for one
too full and straight, neat flick to deep midwicket. Just three of Henry's first over
on a good length and swinging away, tapped to point
back of a length and on off, pushed back to the bowler
on a length and outside off, hammered to the left of mid-off. It just raced away to the boundary
this is even better. On a length and outside off again, Bairstow lays into a drive, hits it all along the ground. Beats mid-off to his left again
too straight, tucked to the leg side
on a length and on off, Billings gets an inside edge onto the pad. It rolls in front of point. He calls for a quick single and they get it
Billings guides this back-of-a-length ball outside off to third man
good length and on off, forward and patted to point
bumper outside off, Bairstow gets out of the way. Too much height on it, wide called
dabbed backward of point for one
Billings flits down the track, Henry bangs it short and outside off, flat-batted to the left of mid-on even as he lost his balance and slipped onto his knees
flicked through backward square leg for a couple
banged in short and rises on off, pulled to deep midwicket for a couple. Good running between the wickets
starts off with a leg-side wide
change of pace at 114.3ks, tapped towards point
length ball, drilled straight down the ground after making some room, beats long-on to his left
good length and on middle, chipped over the bowler's head with a lovely straight bat. Southee runs to his left from long-on but ends up beaten
back of a length, punched to long-on
good length and on middle, defended. The bowler runs forward and dives to his right
on a length and on off, he sinks to one knee and slog-sweeps it over backward square leg. Superb connection from Billings. England take16 from the over
back of a length, jabbing punch to cow corner. Deep midwicket runs to his left and hunts it down
short and wide outside off, chopped hard into the ground. Guptill leaps to his right and gets a hand on it
low full toss on middle, he shuffles across and flicks it beautifully behind square on the leg side
on a length and outside off, dabbed down to third man
dug in short, pulled to deep midwicket
Billings shuffles across off, fetches this from outside off and wristily flicks it to the right of mid-on
short and outside off, down the track, swings and does not connect
yorker, dug out to the leg side
back of a length and outside off, punched past backward point to the right of deep third man for two
Billings charges down the track, Henry delivers a bumper as the ball sails over his head. Wide called for height
another bumper outside off, wide called
Another stunner, Taylor catches it. Billings comes down the track, Henry bags it short. Billings pulls tamely, Taylor flies to his left at short midwicket to break the partnership.
fuller and outside off, driven to the off-side sweeper
full and on off, driven to long-on
back of a length and outside off, Willey cuts and only connects with thin air
back of a length and on off, run down to third man
on a length and outside off, blocked to point
Ronchi puts it down. Nips back in, Bairstow  aims for a forcing stroke, gets an inside edge to the left of the keeper. Rochi dives but can only deflect it to fine leg
pushed to the covers
he goes for a big swing and drags it to mid-on off an inside edge
back of a length and lofted over mid-on for a couple
back of a length and on middle, clipped to mid-on
Bairstow shuffles across off, aims to clip it to leg. He gets an inside edge onto the pad, the ball dribbles to off
width on offer outside off, flat-batted past the covers. Cracker of a hit, he just powered it away. His family applauds from the stands
Henry pulls his length back, pulled to mid-on. Not a well-timed hit
short and outside off, slapped past the covers

Willey departs. Lifting ball outside off, he has to fetch the pull from there. The ball hits the bat as opposed to the bat hitting the ball. Splices it to mid-on, Santner moves to his right and snaps it up
back of a length and outside off, slapped hard into the ground. Guptill leaps at backward point and stops it
back of a length and outside off, punched to midwicket
shortish and outside off, clubbed away to the deep midwicket boundary
half-volley outside off, right in the slot. He closes the face of the bat on the drive and gets an inside edge onto the pad. It dribbles to the off side
back of a length and on off, he is cramped for room but Bairstow clips it down to mid-on and gets to his maiden ODI fifty
back of a length and on a fourth-stump line, Bairstow waits on it and chops it to third man
banged in short, pulled to deep square leg
dug in on a back of a length and outside off, Bairstow ventures deep in the crease and helps it between the two fielders behind square on the leg side with a nifty pull
back of a length and outside off, punched to mid-off for one
too straight, tucked through backward square leg

juggle, juggle and Santner drops it. He is down on his knees. Banged in short and rises outside off, Bairstow ramps it in the air, the ball hits his palm, then his chest and he grasses it. He tries to snatch it on the third attempt but it proves futile. He pedalled back and then belatedly went forward. Santner misjudged it at deep third man
short ball on middle, Rahid misses the pull, takes it on the body and scampers across to the other end
length on off, Bairstow skips away outside leg and drills it to the left of long-off
Bairstow makes room outside leg, Wheeler fires it outside off. Inside the tram-line.
full and outside off, Bairstow throws his bat at it and thickly edges it over short third man
on a fuller length and outside off, Bairstow reaches out, goes down on one knee and slaps it over the covers
on a length and outside off, Rahid pastes it over the covers for four
leg-stumpish ball, off the thigh and runs away in front of square on the leg side
bumper down leg, Rashid pondered a hook before bailing out of the shot and hoisting his bat above his shoulder
yorker outside off, swings and misses
inswinging yorker, right at the base of middle and leg. Dug out
banged in short, pulled to deep midwicket
one-bounce four... Dragged short and outside off, Bairstow marmalises it to the cow corner boundary. It was the slower ball, it sat up and was punished
near yorker, drilled down the ground. Only a single and Bairstow will be on strike
dug in on a shortish length and outside off, another slower ball. Bairstow sits back and launches it over the covers
the debutant aims for a yorker and pushes it too full on off, caressed over the covers. Lovely lofted-drive. Right out of the top draw
back of a length, he sits back, looks to heave and drags it to the right of mid-on off a thick inside edge
back of a length and on middle, Rashid backs away and glides it fine of short third man. Effective improvisation
right in the blockhole on middle, squirted onto the pitch for one
bumper sails over Bairstow to Ronchi. Another wide
England take the series! Bairstow wins it, sending the England dressing room and the crowd into raptures. Good length and outside off, sliced away past backward point for two
